context:
path /v3/bnb/transaction
opid bnbblockchaintransfer
sum send binance / binance token from account to account
desc 10 credits per api call
send binance or binance token token from account to account
this operation needs the private key of the blockchain address every time the funds are transferred the transaction must be signed with the corresponding private key
no one should ever send its own private keys to the internet because there is a strong possibility of stealing keys and loss of funds in this method it is possible to enter privatekey
privatekey should be used only for quick development on testnet versions of blockchain when there is no risk of losing funds in production
 tatum kms should be used for the highest security standards and signatureid should be present in the request
 alternatively using the tatum client library for supported languages
